description: Defines a Flutter widget 'TicCell' representing a single cell in a tic-tac-toe game grid. Handles display and tap interactions, with highlighting for winning lines.

classes.name: TicCell
classes.description: A stateless widget representing a cell in the tic-tac-toe game grid, displaying 'X', 'O', or empty, with customizable colors and highlight for winning lines.

methods.name: _markColor
methods.description: Returns the color for the cell's mark ('X' or 'O') based on the primary or secondary theme color, or transparent if empty.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the cell, including animations, styling, and handling tap gestures.
